rules.name: myRule_4
rules.label: Revenue type on quote line is empty?

Flow.description: Update of discount fields on Quote for Approvals.

value.stringValue:
IF ( (TODAY() - 180 <=[SBQQ__QuoteLine__c].SBQQ__Quote__r.SBQQ__Account__r.CPQ_First_Won_Opportunity_Date__c)
||
ISNULL([SBQQ__QuoteLine__c].SBQQ__Quote__r.SBQQ__Account__r.CPQ_First_Won_Opportunity_Date__c )
, 'New Logo',
IF( CONTAINS( [SBQQ__QuoteLine__c].SBQQ__Quote__r.SBQQ__Account__r.CPQ_Rollup_Stock_Families__c , TEXT( [SBQQ__QuoteLine__c].Stock_Group__c) ) , 'Upsell', 'Cross sell'))

formulas.name: formula_2_myRule_1_A1_6203212576
formulas.expression:
IF ( (TODAY() - 180 <={!myVariable_current.SBQQ__Quote__r.SBQQ__Account__r.CPQ_First_Won_Opportunity_Date__c})
||
ISNULL({!myVariable_current.SBQQ__Quote__r.SBQQ__Account__r.CPQ_First_Won_Opportunity_Date__c} )
, 'New Logo',
IF( CONTAINS( {!myVariable_current.SBQQ__Quote__r.SBQQ__Account__r.CPQ_Rollup_Stock_Families__c} , TEXT( {!myVariable_current.Stock_Group__c}) ) , 'Upsell', 'Cross sell'))

Flow.label: Quote discount fields for Approvals
